entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:20 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -43.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 6:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -43.9°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -59
Dewpoint: -48.1°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 39 with temperature falling to minus 43 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 39 with temperature falling to minus 43 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 57 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
